OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGBASP:
[UE:Meta key="c6eb26fc34734652a68dbb1ad197ebb8" Scale="1"/]Space is a funny place. You can be
using the latest in galaxy-navigation
technology and still find yourself lost
in a sea of space trash. But that's life,
isn't it? If you want to advance, you've
got to be flexible. This also applies to
settling marital disagreements.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGBMICROFC:
[UE:Meta key="7723078aafd643a2a9d48e609b51a3fc" Scale="1"/]During slow days at work, I like to play
this game where I use the zero gravity
to float toy rockets in front of the
ship's window. Then I act out scenes
from my favorite childhood TV show
and pretend there's a galactic war
going on in the distance... I should
probably edit these notes before the
president asks to review them.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGBAROMBLK:
[UE:Meta key="b47e98814c674b6b811434fd2b86192f" Scale="1"/]How interesting that the artist used
a black plank as a canvas and how
they chose to depict the pilot. They
look like the type that works hard for
their beloved family...though the design
of the spaceship is all wrong. Good
luck flying that thing through narrow
meteor crevices!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGBAROMYEL:
[UE:Meta key="97f2bf2d4d9c44f0b119a913510a082f" Scale="1"/]It's a bit unusual to call something a
masterpiece before you read it, but
I've got a good feeling about this one.
I think it's meant for children, but is it
about a boy or a girl? Hopefully both!
It's been hard to please everyone in
the audience at bedtime lately.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADISC:
[UE:Meta key="830ce496f2404297977850d189cffdef" Scale="1"/]I think this might be a tool for warding
off predators. Perhaps if I attached
it to my back, the creatures of this
planet would be deterred from chasing
me. I could test this theory on the
Pikmin... Of course, they might end up
carrying me instead, treasure and all.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASFCMOUSE:
[UE:Meta key="6de054bbc5b74c4085649cb44a2566b2" Scale="1"/]I don't have a creative cell in my body,
but my daughter somehow avoided
this genetic deficiency! When she's
drawing, she becomes so absorbed by
her art it's as if she can't hear a word
I say. That or she's just ignoring me.
I have no idea if what she draws is
any good, but the ability to focus on
something so deeply is talent enough.
Either way, her future is bright!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTANESCLASSICMINI:
[UE:Meta key="efe8bc037f374c70a05eebe7414c22db" Scale="1"/]I like pressing the different directions
of the mathematical symbol, but
there's something captivating about
the two round buttons. I can't help but
want to push them over and over as
fast as I can. I don't want to break
them...but I don't want to stop either!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGCCONWB:
[UE:Meta key="49935c15fd3c474696af579fa7b9bb4e" Scale="1"/]I sort of see the winged aspect, but
mostly this reminds me of a model
spaceship I played with as a kid.
The overall design is perfect for
transcending all kinds of atmospheric
barriers. Plus it looks so cool!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAJOYCONL:
[UE:Meta key="84f85484932943d280ae1ec3e164942f" Scale="1"/]This machine is equipped with an
advanced vibration feature. The
vibrations seem to be communicating
in a vacuum, perhaps trying to reach
out to its corresponding system, which
has likely been lost to time. Who knows
what the machine is trying to say, but
it's telling me something about the
sadness of abandoned technology.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAJOYCONR:
[UE:Meta key="327457c821ca49c899c5773c56de2aa1" Scale="1"/]Sharing is one of civilization's most
important virtues. We share food,
shelter, stories, and sometimes even
checks. I can only hope this belief is
also held by the president of our
company. I'd like him to share in the
form of a holiday bonus this year.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADARTS:
[UE:Meta key="9b9f295dda764cf69e02232c63ca71f6" Scale="1"/]This spear looks like a rocket from the
early days of space exploration. It
may even conceal some kind of high
propulsive force within. But I hope it
has a more romantic history and that
it protected explorers as they sailed
through space, pursuing their dreams.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHIMEFORK:
[UE:Meta key="5dbed3ea64ce4bac9e0142869645fea8" Scale="1"/]Ah, my little girl has always been the
princess of our household! If there was
a miniature version of this, I'd love to
present it to her as her own personal
fork. I can imagine it now! She'd be so
ecstatic, swinging it all around,
wreaking havoc...scaring the dog...
Never mind. I think our little princess
is a tad too spirited for a gift like this.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAICEPICK:
[UE:Meta key="6567ea4416f94def9342c8d4985b1d38" Scale="1"/]Careful! This tool is very sharp. Its
original owner must have wanted to
pierce or crack things open at any
cost! As a lover and preserver of
unique objects, I'm not quite sure I
understand the purpose or value of
an item such as this.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABRUSHA:
[UE:Meta key="3ce3f35dbcc34d3a84217e3be87fe216" Scale="1"/]I'm reminded of a toothbrush I used
when I was a kid. I always wanted to
brush my own teeth, so when my mom
finally gave up helping me, it was a
sweet victory! Unfortunately, that's
when I started to get cavities. I guess
that's the price of independence.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABRUSHB:
[UE:Meta key="9116c9cb8db54d75a2e1cd12c538c7f3" Scale="1"/]Brushing a child's teeth for them is
hard work, made worse by the fact
that they're oblivious to the perils of
tooth decay. I stopped brushing our
kids' teeth for a time so they could
learn for themselves, but that idea did
not go over too well with my wife.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATOOTHMODEL:
[UE:Meta key="5e295a6086e147a8a03df024473ea790" Scale="1"/]I do not want to cross paths with
the owner of these teeth! Of course,
given the height of those molars, I'm
guessing they're too big to have much
in the way of physical agility. And that
could work to my advantage if we DID
encounter one another. I could just run
in frantic circles until they eventually
gave up!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASHINJITSU:
[UE:Meta key="43f8bfd46a144d3ea1fd0e2f016a034f" Scale="1"/]So, the idea is you put your hand in the
mouth and pretend it's being devoured
by whatever's inside this object?
Maybe some people find that funny,
or even romantic, but it seems like
a mediocre party gag to me.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAOSHABURIBLU:
[UE:Meta key="45ae38735a0e46a19adcdb449dc6aeee" Scale="1"/]I look at this and am instantly
overcome by thoughts of my mother
and all the mothers out there. They
represent the power of nature itself,
cocooning the universe in love and
fortifying it with their strength since
the dawn of time.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABOTTLE:
[UE:Meta key="e8ce64c9653a49deb9d60c642fbb33a3" Scale="1"/]This shape resembles a mammalian
appendage. But I have no idea what it
actually does. It's dripping with what
can only be described as beast drool.
I'm hesitant to touch it, but I've got a
duty to my mission...and maybe it
won't be so bad if I close my eyes.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFEEDDISH:
[UE:Meta key="0eff4648f2264d45b348a326f1af767f" Scale="1"/]The bathtub we have at home is much
smaller. If we had one like this, we
could use it as a hot tub and relax
together as a family. Then again, it's
hard to unwind when surrounded by
excited children. Especially ones who
like to splash you in the face.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAENGAGERING:
[UE:Meta key="660eab5316e547c0b6baa900796f49ff" Scale="1"/]It's a common practice to present an
expensive gift to your intended when
you propose. I didn't have the means
to do so when my wife and I became
engaged, and I've always regretted
that fact. But at least I still love her
as much as I did then...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARINGPOP:
[UE:Meta key="f279eb7c44044dd3838226393ca29aa2" Scale="1"/]This gemstone is large but looks kind
of cheap. I've only just started to
accept that one day someone might
propose to my own daughter with a
gift like this... I know I should probably
give that person a warm welcome,
but I already don't like them.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYAMASHINJU:
[UE:Meta key="59f20a12dc634a34990fc6085e8a3eb8" Scale="1"/]My daughter's loved shiny jewels and
trinkets for as long as I can remember.
She used to be happy enough with
pretty stones and pieces of sea glass,
but now all she wants are the more
illustrious items like this. That doesn't
bode well for my wallet's future...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGOLDBAR:
[UE:Meta key="494576ae379045f6aeb6ff5c8891694a" Scale="1"/]Apparently if you can jump over this,
you'll be blessed with great wealth.
I'm not the superstitious type, but I'm
tempted to give it a try. I could use
the extra cash. The only things
standing in my way are my poor
middle-aged hip joints...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACANDLE:
[UE:Meta key="13fa3e61a15c4bfd8c2d5edd7befc777" Scale="1"/]It's a multisensory art experience!
You've got the flicker of the flame,
the texture of the body, and that
glorious scent that just melts into
your surroundings. It's so soothing...
and calming... I'm getting a bit sleepy
here... Is it a...sleep...devi... Zzz...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALIGHTUPRINGBLU:
[UE:Meta key="314b20180adb4f1a8feaebe8af473630" Scale="1"/]I read somewhere that some colors
can have certain effects on your body.
This color seems to calm my mind and
help me recover my composure when
I'm feeling frazzled in the field. It has
an almost healing effect.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALIGHTUPRINGRED:
[UE:Meta key="3ad49aef1b9245e1b7177441a8867171" Scale="1"/]The science of colors intrigues me.
For example, I can feel my instincts
sharpen and my zest for life intensify
when I gaze upon this hue. What would
happen if I were to walk through this
ring with my wife? Perhaps its powers
could reignite the spark between us.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALIGHTUPRINGYEL:
[UE:Meta key="324079521b6b4d16978e926738ae1037" Scale="1"/]People tend to gather with those who
are like-minded, and eventually they
become friends and partners. If you
want to build a circle of good friends,
you must be the kind of person whose
company you enjoy. Then you find
companionship with yourself as well.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABOARDERASER:
[UE:Meta key="19af68a0debf4efabe6d3db7cda15596" Scale="1"/]I've heard this mattress possesses
miraculous relaxation properties that
promise the most restless sleeper a
good night of sleep. I was curious to
know how this would affect me, who
can literally sleep anywhere. Would I
ever wake up again?! Thankfully, I did.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASPONGEA:
[UE:Meta key="a7073f9bcb3b47ce9e26f8e187eb734c" Scale="1"/]My beloved dog, Bulbie, has the
impressive ability to fall asleep
anywhere he wants. We have that in
common! This habit is also one of my
wife's biggest pet peeves. Perhaps if
Bulbie had a designated bed, it would
create a bit more harmony at home...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASPONGEB:
[UE:Meta key="332fca90c3454111b2686a0d2e0f5e4c" Scale="1"/]Research has shown that sound waves
created by a chirping bird are naturally
comforting and induce sleep. Now,
I don't have any strong preferences
when it comes to bedding, but if this
makes me feel like I'm sleeping on the
forest floor, it could be worth a try.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASPONGEC:
[UE:Meta key="c9e932bd7a7b4ee79d13845f01a7df08" Scale="1"/]This thing reminds me of this one time
I was fixing the hull of the S.S. Dolphin.
The combination of the sun and zero
gravity created an illusion... It was as
if I was a fish floating in the open sea.
But in fact I was just me, floating in a
sea of space debris.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASINOCHIP1:
[UE:Meta key="a050d0fb0ca04831bcbc40e7020eca33" Scale="1"/]Whenever I hear a joyful song,
I'm transported back to family
celebrations with live music and
dancing. I see my family, all dressed
to the nines, looking at me with silly
expressions on their faces... I hope
to witness that again one day soon.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASINOCHIP10:
[UE:Meta key="9e0d3a07099244f0b68b2e8ce23953b3" Scale="1"/]A few years ago my wife suspected I
had betrayed her in some way or
another and was furious at me! She
was so enraged, she could have turned
the whole world upside down. It was
terrifying yet comforting to know I
still ignited such passion within her!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASINOCHIP25:
[UE:Meta key="0c6d7f97b30f410f8504469eda4cb49a" Scale="1"/]What is the purpose of emotions?
They give our lives meaning and
balance. One could not survive a life of
pure sorrow, so we must find delight in
things. A life of pleasure would become
monotonous, so we should appreciate
the bad as much as the good!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASINOCHIP50:
[UE:Meta key="3c6ee9c6c05c4c2dbf45f0adc1ecf08a" Scale="1"/]I may not be the most graceful dancer,
but who really cares? I like to let the
music take over and allow my body to
go with the flow. Sometimes my wife
and I will be freestyling, and it looks
like so much fun the kids forget to be
embarrassed and can't help but join in!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASINOCHIP100:
[UE:Meta key="ba1599fd97b64baca52e4090c8859f45" Scale="1"/]My son is a known prankster and likes
to catch my wife and me by surprise.
One time he leapt out from behind a
garden gnome, and my wife jumped so
high in surprise that she threw out her
back. Since then, we've established a
strict household "no surprises" policy.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGAMAGUCHI:
[UE:Meta key="802e8827265d4870af53dfdb8189e12c" Scale="1"/]When I hear the sound this makes, the
word "paycheck" immediately comes
to mind. It's followed quickly by the
image of my wife's face and her voice
reciting our monthly household budget
in full. Food. Tuition. Medical bills.
The list goes on and on and...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAPERCRANEBLU:
[UE:Meta key="81c38597b0b14be5817d3c13405125ad" Scale="1"/]Attaching an intangible wish to a
tangible object seems to be a
universal habit. I wish for my family's
happiness but haven't quite found the
right talisman to attach to it. My
family must be wishing for my safe
return. I hope they have better luck!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAPERCRANERED:
[UE:Meta key="4b6b3aca9cef4c029434f9ada0ef9902" Scale="1"/]This bird reminds me of a mythical
creature famous for granting
immortality to those brave enough to
seek it out. I have no interest in living
forever. Or maybe the idea of risking
my life for the sole purpose of avoiding
death just sounds a bit wonky to me.
Why not enjoy the time you have while
you have it? Anyway, this is a nice
shade of red.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAPERCRANEGLD:
[UE:Meta key="cabdf7f8fa1249cfb8b0f85739180602" Scale="1"/]To have a charm that's solely devoted
to financial luck comes off as vulgar
and gives me an icky feeling. On the
other hand, money is a necessity, and
that's an inescapable fact. Well, there
is one escape. More money. Wouldn't
that be nice...to have a bit more...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAPERBALLOON:
[UE:Meta key="1eb8bdef8a304596800880c5b893e0ae" Scale="1"/]Don't worry too much if it deflates.
Simply pump more air into the top hole,
and the original shape is restored. The
material, though paper-thin, seems to
repel water. Such an inspiring creation!
Only the most advanced civilization
could conceive of such a work of art.
It's like a metaphor for both the
fragility and durability of life itself.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKENDAMAA:
[UE:Meta key="a9f4543e75b34a249732debed241c64f" Scale="1"/]I am deeply moved when I imagine
ancient peoples entrusting this small,
smooth ball with their hopes and
dreams, then passing it down through
the ages. It'd be a comfort to know
that my dreams won't die with me
but will somehow transcend time.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKENDAMAB:
[UE:Meta key="5388501655484a85a68759ba544833d8" Scale="1"/]I'm so bemused by the idea of catching
a dream, but it's difficult to achieve in
practice. I still haven't been able to
catch the ball with the spike upright.
Perhaps I need to try an easier angle...
But would that diminish the challenge
and thus the quality of the dream?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABOAT:
[UE:Meta key="a0d4233524fc40539327ee7e90cf9100" Scale="1"/]They say it's possible to float this
Unfloatable Boat with the help of
divine intervention. That sounds a lot
like luck to me. I've had my fair share
of bad luck, but at least I've been
fortunate enough to survive. Anyhow,
my chances don't look good.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHANDSPINNER:
[UE:Meta key="b1bb99bd022843c6ace02bdc744607ad" Scale="1"/]The movement of the universe always
seemed slow to me, but it's a matter
of perspective. Maybe the movement
of this object is how a higher power
perceives it. We are all so small in the
grand scheme... I get dizzy thinking
about the epic scale of space... Or is it
just the Space Spinner?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGOLDFISH:
[UE:Meta key="8712b67571104307a84e68d192fd2317" Scale="1"/]I'm much more used to seeing fish
painted in profile instead of from the
top down. I suspect this is supposed
to float on the water, but I'd be quite
startled to encounter a fish like this
under normal circumstances.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACASTANETS:
[UE:Meta key="f1c9167890d342e8bfc3e96933bc2773" Scale="1"/]My taste in music is highly refined.
But my wife and kids have no taste at
all! For example, when I ask my family
if they want to go out for karaoke,
they twist their faces and give me a
nasty look! They don't know what
they're missing...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASMALLBELL:
[UE:Meta key="595875c392ac48a098bacdacff6a7a32" Scale="1"/]Sometimes I miss my carefree
bachelor days. Once you have a family,
those days are history! I like spending
time with my wife, but sometimes
I just want to be alone.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHORNBELL:
[UE:Meta key="60ba948cc65845b480723a666eb68ac0" Scale="1"/]When I was a kid, I set off the alarm
system at my primary school just to
see what would happen. As predicted,
I was scolded, but I have no regrets.
We are naturally curious creatures!
Why else would we be here?! I still
get the urge to set off alarms, but
sadly, I've gotten better at resisting
those impulses.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGARAGARA:
[UE:Meta key="b3c808c0b1d24ff181022389fd0580de" Scale="1"/]This object rattles when you move
it. It sounds quite similar to the
frequency emitted by baby goods on
my home planet. I imagine this would
work in a pinch if you had a crying
baby you needed to soothe.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMUSICBOXA:
[UE:Meta key="6240b853c06546b49960fa5d7bb4ec02" Scale="1"/]Strange... Despite its calming tones,
something about this melody makes
my palms sweat and sends shivers up
my spine. It's as if it's sending me a
warning about unexpected troubles
in the future...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMUSICBOXB:
[UE:Meta key="397a9e47208841e89d7b07753da7e6c0" Scale="1"/]There's a healing quality to this song,
and I can't help but gravitate toward
it... Perhaps this is a machine meant
to lure prey for a stronger predator.
The strong do have a disproportionate
advantage on this planet. Wait... Then
does that make me the weaker prey?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMUSICBOXC:
[UE:Meta key="c67d6d46d6014b119ff9166b05d5db2b" Scale="1"/]My son is always playing some sort of
adventure game. He becomes the
hero, defeats his archnemesis, and
saves the day at last... I admire heroic
figures like that, but if given a choice,
I'd choose my own life again and again.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASPEAKER:
[UE:Meta key="94877dabbcbe45b0b351fcda584e7a85" Scale="1"/]I wasn't surprised to discover this had
been found inside a Groovy Long Legs
deep underground. It certainly gives
off the same vibes as a creature made
of inorganic and organic materials. On
a separate note, every time I look at it,
I want to dance.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHANDBELL:
[UE:Meta key="5a33e173912c494e8ae2f82b518f346f" Scale="1"/]Despite its solemn appearance, the
sound emitted by this object is airy
and bright. It reminds me of the
innocence and wonder that lives in the
heart of a young child. It's important
never to lose that sense of childlike
wonder... I know I haven't.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHARMONICA:
[UE:Meta key="734acb885c3b4a468e2367b5cd85cf73" Scale="1"/]Unpainted spaceships look a lot like
this—shiny and ripe for adventure. As
a kid, I would go down to the spaceship
dock just to watch the ships being
assembled. That's where I started to
dream big... In reality, this is likely
some kind of noisemaker.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAOCARINABRN:
[UE:Meta key="5849b45834fc4be991d3546d7dded230" Scale="1"/]Based on its shape and where it was
found, I have deduced this is a nest
for some type of aquatic creature.
On Hocotate, fish are known to use
sunken buildings and objects like their
own underwater apartments. I'm sure
many a life flourished here.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAPPA:
[UE:Meta key="48071d3dbde4439c86ec54cfcee657ee" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure my eardrums will ever
recover from the thunderous noise
emitted by this artifact! I can only
imagine it played a role in many a
naughty child's practical jokes. If
I had one of these as a kid, I'm sure
I would have been a terror!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAWHISTLE:
[UE:Meta key="b5e1c19de82249c79f8ef7ea930c1d8d" Scale="1"/]When I blow air into this rock, it makes
the hair on my neck stick straight up!
But if I blow a little bit harder, the
sound becomes crackly and soft. It's
so pathetic, I can't help but burst into
a fit of giggles whenever I hear it!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPADLOCK:
[UE:Meta key="50c85c0764214e9982839ea59339a853" Scale="1"/]How many times have I heard my
family complain about a jar that won't
open or a door that won't open? And
there I am, saying, "Just run it under
hot water," or, "Push—don't pull."
However, I've tried both on this bag,
and it literally cannot be opened.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHAIRPIN:
[UE:Meta key="3b60675ad918497fb939dbc5078c9fa8" Scale="1"/]When a flower blooms on a dead tree,
it is nothing short of a phenomenon.
I've also witnessed flowers bloom on a
Pikmin's head after they drink nectar.
I suspect this stick shares the same
rejuvenating property exhibited by
other life-forms on this planet.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABUTTONPLASTIC:
[UE:Meta key="c35a37a7c95b4644ac9bccc5fbcf2f26" Scale="1"/]This one time, when I was a kid, my
parents had a big fight and refused to
speak to each other. I went back and
forth, mediating until the argument
was resolved. I'd like to say it was for
the sake of their love, but I was just
tired of waiting for dinner.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABUTTONMETAL:
[UE:Meta key="f053caae436c4138a4aefe7028b098cf" Scale="1"/]I've found that this planet is riddled
with underground caverns and
passageways. I love to explore this
place, but it feels like I'm in constant
danger of falling into a hole. This lid
must have been used to warn previous
inhabitants of nearby pitfalls.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABUTTONWOOD:
[UE:Meta key="be632c92015f4bb3b06e8804c5bbcdd3" Scale="1"/]I'd equip the underside of this raft
with floats so that it hovers above
the water's surface, making it possible
to sail it without sinking. Then I'd plug
the holes with magnifying lenses so I
could peer underwater safely.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACOLLAR:
[UE:Meta key="8d983e8d64a1478c93764c7d288e259c" Scale="1"/]The lovely patina on this piece is
evidence of a deep bond between this
dog and its companion. A dog never
truly forgets their owner, and an
owner will remember their dog for life.
Eternal truths such as this transcend
all times and galaxies.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATHERMOMETER:
[UE:Meta key="9ec45a86c964472096e5f2fc50520812" Scale="1"/]Quantifying the warmth in your heart...
What a brilliant idea! The next time
there's a mix-up between my wife and
me, I can just show her the numerical
value of my feelings for her! Then we
could use it on her, and... Actually,
that part might backfire.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACOUNTER:
[UE:Meta key="1c90cdf6efda498880b3cb48351e4db9" Scale="1"/]Tasks in space require accurate
timing. Docking a spaceship is a good
example of that. If the monitors on
my ship were to break, I'd need to
measure time using my instincts alone.
This is the perfect tool to help me
develop an accurate sense of time!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADENTAKU:
[UE:Meta key="9d9cd6d4d1474b888422db51242a472f" Scale="1"/]This is an extremely sturdy calculator.
I never thought sturdiness was a
necessary quality for a calculator, but
I do recall my wife recalculating our
monthly budgets multiple times after
shopping trips with extreme vigor. And
the calculators I've used for both life
and work do have a tendency to get
thrown around. I guess the craftsmen
on this planet had the right idea.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACARDDENTAKU:
[UE:Meta key="466ed68682944a9e91a2b256d772b5ac" Scale="1"/]I may be able to embed this on the
wall of the ship's computer room. It
could be useful for making manual
calculations should the ship's AI ever
crash unexpectedly. Space pilots need
to be prepared for any emergency, and
I'll take all the help I can get.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGRIPPER:
[UE:Meta key="c2ab3c54d3174379a3dd61e8a78e3e0a" Scale="1"/]I'm no longer trying to catch anyone's
eye, but as the sole breadwinner,
I need to prioritize my health so I can
support my family for years to come.
The problem is, I'm so busy supporting
them, there's not a lot of time left for
pushups. We'll see how it all turns out.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGOLFBALL:
[UE:Meta key="f3b3869d07ad4330bf88807b25ebf194" Scale="1"/]Its hard outer shell could withstand
severe environments, but the inside
appears to be unexpectedly soft.
The geological layers are breathtaking.
If I had to guess, I'd say this is a scale
model of a celestial body. I just can't
explain why I want to hit it with a stick.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATENNISBALL:
[UE:Meta key="2822385c808341608d8e34ab6e0b2930" Scale="1"/]Growing up, I wasn't one for chasing
balls or shedding tears over a win or a
loss, but my passions were equally
absorbing... I wonder why this giant
fuzzy sphere has me thinking of more
youthful days and what they were like
for the inhabitants of this planet.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHARDBALL:
[UE:Meta key="37cd0ac4b3184410bc9da4fb00373bcd" Scale="1"/]I can verify that there are indeed 108
stitches on this ball. I counted them
myself! The process took me all night
to complete. As an explorer, it's
important to question things in order
to survive, but I should be careful not
to overdo it.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGODDESS:
[UE:Meta key="acf710fc32d44041be654dfd5de2bfc5" Scale="1"/]This statue seems to be imbued with
the majesty of an ancient goddess.
When I look up at her, I can't help but
be mesmerized by her beauty...until
my neck starts throbbing in pain.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAVENUS:
[UE:Meta key="119aab9dba83430caf2a3165dfdfb401" Scale="1"/]What manner of calamities had
befallen the planet at the time this
statue was created? Apocalyptic
catastrophes...extreme weather...the
wrath of the gods? The questions that
artifacts like this inspire are what
make them truly valuable.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARODAN:
[UE:Meta key="5a6b42131fb14ee9aa5e108bbc8f393b" Scale="1"/]Could I be related to the person who
modeled for this statue? While
examining it earlier, I found myself
striking the same pose without even
realizing it! If we do share the same
genes, how did they end up on this
side of space? Hmm...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMOAI:
[UE:Meta key="0519de2313944da082edcbf51a788992" Scale="1"/]Looking upon this warrior's calming
visage is a peaceful way to spend an
hour. The eyes seem to see through
everything, as if their gaze is freeing
you from the darkness of your mind.
Perhaps I've stumbled upon the sacred
key to life's greatest questions.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADOGUHEAD:
[UE:Meta key="5a0d170cdf3e499fad95346a40f884d0" Scale="1"/]This looks a lot like a figurine my son
learned about in school. I've always
wondered why she wears goggles.
What does she have to hide? Maybe
a secret past with another ancient
statue floating around out there...
I look forward to discussing this
theory with my son.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMANEKINEKO:
[UE:Meta key="f86e594383dc4cb0901062582b931344" Scale="1"/]While looking at this statue, I found
myself smiling and petting its head for
no discernible reason. It must possess
a magical ability to captivate people
and convince them to do its bidding.
How can something so devious and
manipulative be so cute?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADARUMA:
[UE:Meta key="829f7fff23a747abb9cf812f070d12ef" Scale="1"/]I've never been the type to give up.
No matter how many times I fall, I'll
always get back up again. At first I
thought I could practice alongside this
machine, but its stubby body reminds
me too much of the president. One
glance at it, and I lose all motivation
to continue.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPHOTOFRAME:
[UE:Meta key="de5775713c36406bbd74e634094206fe" Scale="1"/]What mysterious and fluffy creatures.
I can't find evidence of them in any of
the existing creature databases, but
there's something familiar about them.
It's almost as if I've met them before...
I guess I'll chalk it up to an ancient
memory that's been imprinted on
my genome.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMASK:
[UE:Meta key="16442839205c4f5583f358857a3ade29" Scale="1"/]I can't pinpoint the exact moment, but
this reminds me of the face my wife
once made when I delivered a perfectly
executed "dad joke."
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACHERRY:
[UE:Meta key="4c7b634ee34e47f7917ecaae2fe8abda" Scale="1"/]What a perplexing plant... It appears
to be carrying two different types of
berries! They must be a rare species
of fruit. Both have odd traits. One
seems to be a suppressant, while
the other is a stimulant. It's not
easy to tell which is which.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAAPRICOT:
[UE:Meta key="c11b65ea34e440fe838a7832d5618783" Scale="1"/]In my youth, I used to power through
long night shifts by sucking on sour
fruit candy. It somehow energized me
and kept me wide awake! I couldn't do
that now, even with the candy, but it's
an example of how sometimes things
turning sour can work out for the best!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABIWA:
[UE:Meta key="ae484f8e3b354ec6b207909ffcd5b14b" Scale="1"/]When my first child was born, my wife
and I would sit outside in the warm
spring weather and take turns rocking
him in our arms. Those days were filled
with endless joy. The sunlight bouncing
off his downy hair looked just like this.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKIWI:
[UE:Meta key="8c705249234c476ca7e733347b6e2c98" Scale="1"/]The fruit on this planet is
astonishingly large. If we could
cultivate these ample fruits on
Hocotate, nobody would ever go
hungry again! Sadly, I don't know
anything about agriculture. Maybe I
should have listened to my wife when
she told me to do yard work...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKIWIGLD:
[UE:Meta key="f96e6174ae4b43b5a76ab424196a4113" Scale="1"/]My wife went through a phase where
all she talked about was Piktamin and
its nutritious value. She charted
Piktamin U percentages, and then
there was A and P... I never really
understood what she was talking
about, but she was so passionate
about it I couldn't help but listen.
I bet she'd really like to try this fruit.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGRAPEFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="9686692c4d98460683511e3d2bee6a1f" Scale="1"/]The night after I ate this fruit, I had a
dream in which I saw lots of them
growing, clustered together on a tree.
If I were able to grow and harvest that
many, we'd never run out of food.
I suppose we won't know what's
possible until I plant the first seed...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMELON:
[UE:Meta key="2e4c27a2d634438c877d08f8036d2126" Scale="1"/]Picking the right "get well soon" gift is
notoriously tricky. You're supposed to
choose something you think the
recipient would enjoy and ignore your
own preferences. That's easier said
than done. When I can't think of
anything good, I usually default to
some sort of food, like this fruit.
I know I'm always hungry when I'm sick.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARASPBERRY:
[UE:Meta key="f6ef6431e6f1425681e2b9e0e5254cef" Scale="1"/]Numerous pockets of juice clustered
around a hollow interior...much like
memories—both sweet and sour—that
burst with meaning yet still cannot
fill that empty place in one's heart.
Gazing upon this fruit always fills
me with regret.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPLUM:
[UE:Meta key="e23cc909df3148ac89bcf12e1398af0b" Scale="1"/]One whiff of this fruit will have your
mouth watering, but the taste itself
is sour and slightly disappointing.
However, you can't let results like this
keep you from trying new things.
There's no greater quality than an
adventurous spirit!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPEACH:
[UE:Meta key="121938d451a74bc489bae2c6f1ad2fdb" Scale="1"/]Extremely sweet! Almost too sweet...
The flavor makes you feel drowsy with
joy, and you want to soak in those
joyful juices forever and ever... I may
need to limit my intake when it comes
to this fruit.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMUSCAT:
[UE:Meta key="b79ae58516894d648c08e31ce7b1af61" Scale="1"/]This fruit comes in bunches, so you
can keep eating them and never run
out! A single berry satisfies my
appetite, but I'm grateful to live in a
universe with such natural abundance.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAGRAPE:
[UE:Meta key="35c8e048421d490781ab06b4d50cbff4" Scale="1"/]I've noticed that the skin contains a
substance with antioxidant properties.
That's probably why I feel so fresh
and invigorated after I eat one.
I wonder how I'd feel after eating two...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAWATERMELON:
[UE:Meta key="a7a44ea5924642728bf968919ccba8b6" Scale="1"/]I look at this fruit and am instantly
overcome by the urge to split it into
a million pieces. I closed my eyes to
avoid the thought, but the impulse
just got stronger. I must be holding
on to a deep desire to take on and
defeat a giant spherical obstacle...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMANGOSTEEN:
[UE:Meta key="243991feea954d49a76e1660c787be66" Scale="1"/]Don't ask me how I know, but if you
draw a face on this fruit, it bears
an uncanny resemblance to my wife
wearing a hat. It even emits the same
stylish and judgmental aura... Funny
how the doodled version of her is as
intimidating as the real thing.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAAVOCADO:
[UE:Meta key="b7ba086b9a35463cbda9ceb08a8b2667" Scale="1"/]The hard, scaly shell that covers this
fruit gets softer and darker as it
ripens, so determining the optimal time
to peel and eat it can be difficult. It's
as if the fruit is actively trying to
sabotage your enjoyment of it. I've
never known produce to be so sneaky.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAPAYA:
[UE:Meta key="8bd453d4d8f940b8983b105226fa797d" Scale="1"/]I always thought it was better to eat
fruit when it's ripe, but this one is just
as enjoyable and nutritious when it's
green. The same can be said about
creatures like us—many think maturity
is superior, but inexperience and youth
are what provide fresh perspectives.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASTARFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="a51fd5d381664f08a317e23e91c81429" Scale="1"/]To look at a cross section of this fruit,
you'd think it was a drawing of a star,
like one my son would make. Stars
don't actually look like that, so why do
we draw them this way? Maybe the
secret to the universe is hidden within
those five points.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMANGO:
[UE:Meta key="fdafbd999fa04c30bab816abb9c0cbd7" Scale="1"/]Peeling this fruit is arduous due to
its soft skin. When I tried to eat it
without first removing the peel, a rash
developed around my mouth. I had
better success when I slit grid-like
cuts into the skin and flipped it inside
out. The results were delicious.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANANA:
[UE:Meta key="97604883d6e949ec8c85e7db6885fe33" Scale="1"/]I must confess...I once slipped and
fell on a peel that I thoughtlessly
discarded onto the floor after eating
the fruit inside. I'm really too old to be
making mistakes like that. I can even
hear my own voice scolding myself.
"Don't forget to clean up your trash!"
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADRAGONFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="2b248ec5f3f4407ca0782be935123d5d" Scale="1"/]Throughout my life, I've met people
who seemed flashy or fancy but were
actually quite down-to-earth. I've also
met people who were as arrogant as
they looked. The same lesson should
be applied to this fruit. It looks pretty
intimidating, but what's on the inside?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALIME:
[UE:Meta key="99c1bae8c92c499da4bc6cf7353229ee" Scale="1"/]Seems to be a Citrus Lump but
younger and very green. Inexperience
is usually perceived as a weakness,
but its power should not be
underestimated. Many an organization
has been improved by a newcomer's
creative and untamed energy.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAICHIJIKU:
[UE:Meta key="16e30a888bae4c8eaec96cd4eb8ed036" Scale="1"/]While observing the plant bear fruit,
I was unable to work out where and
when the flowers bloomed. I was so
frustrated that I couldn't figure out
basic botany... But all those annoying
feelings faded away as soon as I bit
into the fruit's sweet flesh.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKAKI:
[UE:Meta key="6220c8220db34ccf828b54ecc614b8d4" Scale="1"/]This fruit reminds me of a particular
sunset I witnessed years ago. My son
and I were walking home together one
evening, and the sun was setting right
across our path. I remember it like it
was yesterday... It wasn't spectacular
in the least, but I'll never forget it.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTANASHI:
[UE:Meta key="aae9ec0289034382a7d30b1bdca36b6e" Scale="1"/]This fruit has a high water content,
and its skin is so thin that you can
bite right through it. It'd be the most
perfect snack to keep in your pack on
a long hike through the desert, if only
it didn't bruise so easily.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALAFRANCE:
[UE:Meta key="171f9f99181e4d17ac4c080ee1eb1070" Scale="1"/]There's an elegance about this fruit...
Its graceful curves and subtle flavor
bring to mind images of ornate
ballrooms, overflowing with cultured
guests and blossoming flowers. The
simple act of eating it makes me
feel a little fancier...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAICHIGO:
[UE:Meta key="49c8fa047a644629ac23f2d886d2d257" Scale="1"/]The scent of this fruit tickles my
heart for some reason. It makes me
think back on summer memories, my
wife smiling at me in the sunlight...
She'd probably have a good laugh if
she ever read this, but that wouldn't
be so bad. I happen to love that sound!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARINGO:
[UE:Meta key="791b41c166114e7392049fe81d9ec2e2" Scale="1"/]This fruit could be hiding more than a
tasty interior... On more than a few
occasions, I've found bugs munching
their way through the sweet flesh,
presumably enjoying a snack of their
own. How funny to think that I share
the same taste in fruit as a worm.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMIKAN:
[UE:Meta key="49f7b1c57aac4453861590ec70da32b2" Scale="1"/]This fruit is so shiny and round it
reminds me of a beach ball whenever
I see it. Yet it's so yummy that I can't
help but get cravings for it and end
up eating it all the time. The only
drawback is that I'm constantly
disappointed that I'm not on vacation.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADEKOPON:
[UE:Meta key="ea21c1e2ff654602bbbfa821c2d58b27" Scale="1"/]Some people may like to peel this fruit
from the top, but I prefer to attack it
from the bottom instead. Whenever I
go from the top, I get this tingly
feeling around my belly button. I find
it very unnerving.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALEMON:
[UE:Meta key="e8139ca594894e9899241589c572971d" Scale="1"/]The love between my wife and I has
been captured in all sorts of romantic
memories, as sweet and sour as this
fruit. It's fun to return to those
memories and feel what I felt then...
Sometimes I wonder how my kids will
feel the first time they fall in love.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASQUEEZER:
[UE:Meta key="de2f575381c8453a90f35f2e0905e015" Scale="1"/]When I look at the company president,
I can't see myself climbing the
corporate ladder. To be a manager, it
seems like you've also got to be an
inhuman, heartless villain. These
traits allow them to squeeze their
dedicated workers without mercy
and still sleep at night. I feel that
same merciless cruelty radiating from
this metallic altar. I wonder if it was
once used for dark, unspeakable
ceremonies. Or perhaps it was once
the desk of a corporate boss.
We'll never know...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSRED:
[UE:Meta key="9becb4f6920143d1aa35215d45d9485b" Scale="1"/]This is my favorite color. I love how it
imbues passion and emotion into
everything it touches. Come to think
of it, the first Pikmin I encountered
were red... Perhaps that's why I
instinctively trusted them. Colors can
influence behavior in all kinds of ways.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSBLU:
[UE:Meta key="da45f2af40a64ef0b57f3ad74475cda5" Scale="1"/]This color is very similar to that of the
Blue Pikmin. I prefer red.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSYEL:
[UE:Meta key="37443ae34d024194a11592c31a5f1c98" Scale="1"/]I heard that Pikmin of the same color
were found in the same location.
Could there be a correlation? Some
creatures change their appearance
to match their environment. I'd like to
observe what happens to those Pikmin
when exposed to other environments...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSPPL:
[UE:Meta key="f1b87e39a39f45bfb5cd7d0695580c7d" Scale="1"/]Found in a dark location. Luckily, it was
just bright enough to be spotted in
the vicinity of Purple Pikmin. I've never
associated purple with strength, but
I've since had to revise my thinking.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSWHT:
[UE:Meta key="a8ea2c364b2e4a769ce76842dfdf6351" Scale="1"/]Discovered in an obscure locale
alongside White Pikmin. Creatures with
bright colors are usually more likely to
be packing poison, while creatures with
dull coloration are generally harmless.
But this doesn't apply to White Pikmin!
In fact, they're dangerously poisonous.
No doubt they use this to their
advantage.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSBLK:
[UE:Meta key="dd484bb492304c379c7394140d94214c" Scale="1"/]This color reminds me of Rock Pikmin.
When I first touched one, I was
surprised by how cold it felt. It was a
pleasant sensation, and they didn't
seem to mind my curiosity. Much like
this treasure, Rock Pikmin were found
in a dark, chilly place. How appropriate.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSPNK:
[UE:Meta key="27b6cf1f94de468eb90bd1a5363604ee" Scale="1"/]An attractive color, similar to that of
the Winged Pikmin that were found in
its vicinity. It mystifies me how such
helpless creatures have survived for
so long. Their bright color makes it so
easy for a predator to spot them.
Needless to say, I find them to be
particularly fascinating.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSAQU:
[UE:Meta key="862c25d926774f5ca9703bef5eb8aaf8" Scale="1"/]This color reminds me of the ice
emitted by the Sus nivisventis... Is it a
coincidence that I encountered this
treasure and Ice Pikmin in the same
area? It's no coincidence that Ice
Pikmin are called that. If I licked one,
I'm sure my tongue would stick to it!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPAINTSGRN:
[UE:Meta key="9b8c462eb7ae4de4b03cd654e33e8563" Scale="1"/]The same color as the Glow Pikmin
that appear while exploring at night.
Many think neon colors are artificial,
but they're actually the result of
certain materials reacting to short
wavelengths of light. So really they are
quite natural and another example of
how our perception can be unreliable.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALLCUE:
[UE:Meta key="0e6683a2fc604aa8b72d18af26a99451" Scale="1"/]This ball is meant to represent
truth, but the truth is never truly
black or white. It's both subjective and
objective, and extremely tricky. I think
the color grey would make more sense
for this object, or maybe that hideous
brown you get when you mix all the
paint colors together.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL1:
[UE:Meta key="143d47fd71a14fd6a0336f56ef58c3e4" Scale="1"/]There's nothing in the universe more
interesting than the universe itself.
A curious and inquisitive mind will
never be satisfied, no matter how
much you explore. I hope I feel this
way as long as I can. It's important
to stay interested in your work.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL2:
[UE:Meta key="87d2d0057303429791df043423e9e077" Scale="1"/]It's often said that you don't realize
how much your parents have done for
you until it's too late to thank them.
I try to show my gratitude and keep in
touch as much as I can with video
calls, but as soon as my kids pop on-
screen, my parents forget I'm there.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL3:
[UE:Meta key="e235f056ca034d838f68ed9f65d4c704" Scale="1"/]I know it's impossible to read minds,
but I am particularly clueless when it
comes to relationships. When we first
started dating, my wife was gracious
enough to explain how she felt in great
detail. I'm still awkward, but any social
skills I do have are thanks to her.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL4:
[UE:Meta key="b95f4e26252e46d88f0bb523e5f3dd16" Scale="1"/]I've never minded having to start over
or pick up my life at the flip of a
switch. My environment and those in
my social circle might change, but as
long as I have my family with me, I'll
still be me. They always call me out
when I'm "acting totally weird."
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL5:
[UE:Meta key="94361c7ead6a42018adcd8f2d692aff6" Scale="1"/]It's become painfully obvious to me
that the mind and body are closely
linked. Spending so much time away
from my family is hard on my mental
health, and it visibly takes a toll on my
body. Even when I eat healthy and
exercise! I really miss them...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL6:
[UE:Meta key="95efbc73ca0348439619df7a42266179" Scale="1"/]It just occurred to me that I haven't
had a checkup in... I'm embarrassed to
say how long. You're supposed to do it
once a year, but I keep putting it off.
Lately, my elbow's been making an odd
clicking sound every time I move it...
I should get it checked out eventually.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL7:
[UE:Meta key="66eec9558bcd45198e1ab30ab97affdf" Scale="1"/]Getting lost in space is as good as a
death sentence. The newest ships
have technology that can locate
the closest planet and initiate an
emergency landing. Yet they still
haven't built a navigation system that
can detect and avoid incoming
meteorites and space trash...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL8:
[UE:Meta key="4493b5c2a8ac4866946f86d437606388" Scale="1"/]It's easy to lose someone's trust,
despite the fact that it takes so long
to build it in the first place. But once
you have that trust and support, it's
much easier to achieve your goals. I'd
rather be able to count on someone I
trust than leave it all up to chance!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABILLIARDBALL9:
[UE:Meta key="a5ca009ca3d54b97a06c54b2e8f5aa73" Scale="1"/]I never considered myself to be
someone with a lot of inner strength
or fortitude, but my wife seems to
disagree. I must be playing it way too
cool when we're together...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPINBADGEA:
[UE:Meta key="3433e400dc234ed1bb17fa6e8907a75b" Scale="1"/]The first time I rode in a spaceship,
I was a student working part-time
for an intraspace transportation
company. The excitement I felt during
that first launch was...unforgettable.
The iconic rocket engraved on this
shield reminds me of that moment.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPINBADGEB:
[UE:Meta key="85a2b6f4e8314487b4c1b1a0a486e630" Scale="1"/]When I was little, I'd look at pictures of
the planets and imagine that the rings
around them were roads you could
travel on... Of course, once I got to
space, I learned that those rings are
usually made up of dust particles.
I've never been so disappointed.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPINBADGEC:
[UE:Meta key="baf8d357cb374d629416953c3e336758" Scale="1"/]Someone told me that when a satellite
is decommissioned, some of its lights
will start to blink spontaneously as it
falls through the atmosphere. It's
likely a glitch, but I'd like to believe the
satellite's sending one last message
before burning up into nothingness...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPINBADGED:
[UE:Meta key="36095aca8146498bbdd41db70774e1fb" Scale="1"/]The figure on this shield is wearing
something quite similar to our
space suits. That would mean these
living beings must have looked
something like us... I wonder who they
were and what their faces looked like.
Could they have been our ancestors
who migrated through space to our
planet long ago?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPINBADGEE:
[UE:Meta key="762a6c18773b4e5c86d8e7f3ee90bdcc" Scale="1"/]I often encounter comets and meteors
on the job, and collisions are bound
to happen. I once had to make a
crash landing for that very reason...
I like to look back at those events
as "unexpected adventures," but at
the time, they're pretty harrowing.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFRUITSPICKPNK:
[UE:Meta key="64c84d5bdbdf4899ad7f7a95ceaf44b3" Scale="1"/]Even though it's awkward to handle,
I assume it's a weapon of some kind.
I like how lightweight and user-friendly
it is, but I'm not sure how effective it
would be against most threats. Either
way, it's a lot of fun to play with!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFRUITSPICKGRN:
[UE:Meta key="99ba2635520f4ff2aa7ec8781a699425" Scale="1"/]It must've been pretty hard to see this
sword in the forest, as it would blend
in with the foliage. Applying apatetic
coloration to a weapon is more than
just practical. It's brilliant! I'm always
amazed at the creative solutions that
float around in the minds of others...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFRUITSPICKBLU:
[UE:Meta key="49836b258fa0482c82eabb77e8d8fbb7" Scale="1"/]I've visited a few icebound planets
while delivering cargo throughout
space. Based on my experience, I find
it hard to believe this material could
withstand such a severe environment.
I think it's likely this object was used
for another purpose.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFRUITSPICKORN:
[UE:Meta key="61b8c3fab6d746278f8627cec0cc31e0" Scale="1"/]My son used to have a toy sword in a
similar color. He was obsessed with it
and brought that sword everywhere
he went, including the dinner table.
That is, until I explained that it was
dishonorable for a hero to attack a
weaker citizen wielding only a fork.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFRUITSPICKYEL:
[UE:Meta key="3e3e2dd7db50444e8feb802f620143e3" Scale="1"/]With all these different-colored
swords, I assume that the armies on
this planet color coded their troops.
An entire unit with matching weapons
and uniforms would have been a sight
to behold! I'm sure this color especially
stood out.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEA:
[UE:Meta key="ed10dd55e8464f6dab1091af908d2da4" Scale="1"/]The vastness of space and the
unknown it contains is an unsolvable
puzzle. At the start of each voyage,
I set out to unravel every mystery and
discover great truths, but I always find
myself returning with more questions
than answers...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEB:
[UE:Meta key="ad90259a0ca644059f4e43d6f9b5ca1e" Scale="1"/]At Hocotate Freight, we often divide
up our cargo in order to use the ship's
space more efficiently. Big companies
have huge transporters to fill up, but
that also means a lot less flexibility.
They're still filling up their gigantic
ships while we're out making deliveries!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEC:
[UE:Meta key="b9a9de382ba84cf7848642ca54da9e0b" Scale="1"/]As a boy, I would spend days drawing
elaborate treasure maps. The buried
treasure may have been junk to most,
but to me it was precious. Is this a
fragment of a treasure map? I doubt
it... But the subject of this drawing
was probably a treasure to the artist.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLED:
[UE:Meta key="70e3459701384bdab2bb71b9dce4a24c" Scale="1"/]I understand the instinct to hide
something precious to you, though the
word "protect" is probably more apt.
I feel similarly about my family. I'd do
everything in my power to give them
a safe, happy life. It's a simple desire,
but it motivates me to carry on.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEE:
[UE:Meta key="47148f01d32b4c7186d4ed83917847c1" Scale="1"/]This looks just like the kind of pictures
you get when you let a kid play with a
camera. Blurry and too close-up to see
anything. I deleted all those pictures
my kids took to free up memory space,
but now I wish I hadn't. Imperfect
memories can be the most precious...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEF:
[UE:Meta key="3ced89aac8c14b698b90d68b38cd990b" Scale="1"/]This makes me think of my dog, Bulbie,
back at home. I'm away for work quite
a bit, so we've gone long periods
without seeing each other. Yet every
time I come home, he treats me as
if I never left. He may be the wisest
and most loving member of the family.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEG:
[UE:Meta key="e1489f053b0545048f8f6460efe4b71d" Scale="1"/]This unknown organism bears a strong
resemblance to the dogs on my planet.
I'm amazed that such a similar species
could exist in the far reaches of outer
space. I've heard that organic
components can travel through space
on meteorites and comets. Could there
be a connection between my planet
and this one?
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEH:
[UE:Meta key="ae746e9596404f33977ac9fc02310891" Scale="1"/]As a young boy, I collected rocks and
shiny objects that I held quite dear.
My parents always wanted me to get
rid of them, but I refused. I can't even
remember where I found them all.
I probably picked up most of them right
in our own backyard. I'm still not sure
why I was so attached to a bunch of
gravel, but they shone like diamonds
to me.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEI:
[UE:Meta key="8c3d7c968e80422a85f361af22110681" Scale="1"/]As a child, there were many times I'd
come across something unknown to
me and intuitively investigate without
hesitation. It worked out well for me,
I believe! As an adult, I often overthink
matters, so maybe I need to recapture
that daring spirit of my youth!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEJ:
[UE:Meta key="e6311208e69249238f39f97bbc733df5" Scale="1"/]Why are things the way they are? The
answer can be surprisingly simple. For
example, my kids will often dismantle a
clock or a chair, or tear up a piece of
bread just because they can. Maybe
there's no significant reason that this
picture is in pieces either.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEK:
[UE:Meta key="bf6423308cb54f57a75e72cf44e09417" Scale="1"/]That little bump at the end makes this
look like it has a nose... Noses make me
think of my son when he was a baby.
He'd often forget my face after I'd
been gone for long stints of work and
cry when I got home. But once he knew
the distinctive shape of my nose, he
recognized me right away.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUZZLEL:
[UE:Meta key="95dec2a2819041198dbf268e15ad4105" Scale="1"/]Did I dream of becoming a glorified
deliveryman? Or was adventure
always my true goal, given my current
circumstances? Who knows. I'm proud
to say I've achieved both, but the
president might see it differently.
Hmm. I'm worried about my
annual bonus.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAKUSHIYAKI:
[UE:Meta key="1bf972e6c60943ce8312e069beea3cc4" Scale="1"/]Mmm... I can tell that it'd give me tons
of power and stamina. I'm not athletic,
but if I ate this whole thing, I'm sure I
could work for three days straight
without a wink of sleep! Now that I
think about it...I don't want the
president to hear about this and
get any ideas.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAHAM:
[UE:Meta key="ac18c5f7cf55435a99c32966a67ab93c" Scale="1"/]I never expected to find such an
appetizing cut of meat in a dark
underground lair. Why was it there?
How was it made? And is there a
reason for its large size? I imagine it
was an offering to some great figure.
I shall pay my respects later as well.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASUSHIMAGURO:
[UE:Meta key="005ca72ea56248c98672c3741171c3c7" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure why you'd want to eat
raw fish... Maybe cookery on this
planet advanced so far they were able
to recreate the essence of the original
ingredients... It'd be easier to eat if I
could cut it down into smaller pieces,
but that might be insulting to the chef.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASUSHITAMAGO:
[UE:Meta key="ec47e76b514a4fc88eb899d280aa3a7d" Scale="1"/]I understand the white granular parts
on the bottom to be fish eggs. One
time when I went fishing with my son,
we caught a fish who was carrying
eggs like these. It was a revelatory
moment for him to see how life can
differ from species to species.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASUSHIEBI:
[UE:Meta key="189dfd0cc46844149247eaaf8be70c53" Scale="1"/]One of my favorite birthday gifts as a
child was a book I received called
20,000 Millimeters under the Sea.
I believe I owe my adventurous spirit to
that novel. How funny that a piece of
seafood from a different planet could
remind me of my childhood self.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATAKOWIENER:
[UE:Meta key="e6836464855f496e98fb68c132c2c8d6" Scale="1"/]A strange life-form that mimics an
octopus... Hmm... We've discovered
other creatures that use mimicry, but
in this case, it's fairly unconvincing. I'm
not even sure it IS a life-form. I intend
to dissect it to investigate further,
but first I will try one tiny bite...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFISHCRUET:
[UE:Meta key="b648b9f6ad2343b9b2ac0ded13300eb8" Scale="1"/]It's disturbing to see a mouth that
can be removed like a cap. If it were
reattached improperly, would the
bodily fluids simply pour right out?!
I remember when a supposedly airtight
container of mine once failed. My bag
smelled like onion soup for a week!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAAMMOLITE:
[UE:Meta key="0ac302fa613f4651a91c457d1712c3af" Scale="1"/]A fossil excavated at the beach. From
its shape, I can deduce that it was
cast by an aquatic creature. That
could indicate that the current site of
the beach was once the ocean floor.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATRILOBITE:
[UE:Meta key="28d0d161ec8e4418ab4a733c26ee385f" Scale="1"/]Discovered along a mountain stream,
its shape reminds me of a type of
footwear used when moving through
shallow waters. Perhaps this creature
mimicked the shoe prints of this
planet's inhabitants as a way to hide
in plain sight and steal their food...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOHEAD:
[UE:Meta key="63e4a6554ba04e0b9da1b610324ed4df" Scale="1"/]I was in awe of modular robots when I
was growing up. Their strength and
abilities impressed me to my core!
I doubt anyone's ever admired me in
such a way, but maybe that's not so
bad. I find great satisfaction in being
respected as an equal.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOBODY:
[UE:Meta key="6972554a3b524e5faaca978bd023c9c5" Scale="1"/]Once I get started on something, I'm
the type that can't help but keep 
piling on more and more for myself to
do. If that's considered hard work,
then I guess I like hard work. The only
problem is the result of hard work isn't
always good work.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOHANDR:
[UE:Meta key="e9d30d69c9564f87bb8e3c482c9790b8" Scale="1"/]It's crucial to believe that you are
capable of success. But just because
you believe it doesn't guarantee it will
happen. Then again, if you don't believe
it, you're unlikely to succeed at all.
That's why you have to clench your
fists and remain strong in the face
of every challenge. For me, the
ultimate success will be returning
home to my family. I believe I can...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOHANDL:
[UE:Meta key="1a0b97d6023c4a97b52fb54605dd342c" Scale="1"/]For me, love and protectiveness go
hand in hand. When I think of my
daughter—rambunctious, willful,
a bright spark of joy—both feelings
come forth at once. I'd do anything to
keep her spark from fading the way
mine has... If she read this now,
she'd say, "Lighten up, Dad!"
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOLEGR:
[UE:Meta key="c2d462c971004ffbad0464192ef8497e" Scale="1"/]Legs are some of the most important
parts of a living organism. Not only are
they used for walking and running, but
that movement helps circulate blood
throughout the body. Some even call
legs the second heart. I wonder if my
toes serve a second purpose as well...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAROBOLEGL:
[UE:Meta key="76cef203fb0f408a9275cfbb5f939bc9" Scale="1"/]Many people don't realize that they
not only have a dominant hand but
a dominant leg as well! That leg can
even be more muscular or longer
than its nondominant counterpart.
Too big of an imbalance between the
legs can have staggering effects.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLSA:
[UE:Meta key="7c690d798d5e458fa82800bea0ec6847" Scale="1"/]I look forward to one day looking upon
the face of my grandchild... If it's as
cute as this one, I couldn't help but
dote on them! But it doesn't really
matter what they look like or if they
resemble me or someone else in my
family. I've always thought that
grandchildren are meant to be spoiled!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLSB:
[UE:Meta key="5c7ba48e63eb43e4a981ec6acae8a044" Scale="1"/]I used to know a guy who would never
give in to his kids when they begged
him for something—yet one look from
his grandkids, and he'd give them
anything they wanted. It seems that a
grandchild possesses immense powers
of persuasion. Or it's just magic.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLMA:
[UE:Meta key="65dbcad9caf54ba6b4c6b3324bfd91e3" Scale="1"/]Children often exhibit both the
positive and negative qualities of their
parents. I think that's why we feel for
them so much. What's more, we want
them to keep improving and even
exceed the expectations we set for
ourselves. It's hard work being a kid.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLMB:
[UE:Meta key="b3200cea3ca644bcbf8f825c762773fd" Scale="1"/]I've worked hard so I wouldn't be a
financial burden on my parents, and I
don't want my kids to be dependent on
me when they grow up. A parent's
job is to raise independent children...
but not too independent. You still want
them to come home for the holidays.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLLA:
[UE:Meta key="245d234bb7c84ccc9118e0ecc8fd908b" Scale="1"/]As a parent, you need to be able to
hide some emotions from your children.
It's harder than you think... I remember
telling my parents about my career
goals and seeing the disappointment in
their eyes. It hurt, but I'm glad it didn't
pull me off my path.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMATDOLLLB:
[UE:Meta key="84026f3b3d3c4efd9a53aae660e08ef2" Scale="1"/]Once you have children, money starts
disappearing faster than you can save
it. My wife always says, "If it's for the
children, it's worth it." I admire her
enormous heart... Still, every year it
seems like the children get more and
more expensive.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATRAINA:
[UE:Meta key="e5bf08d32fdb46749d70b29f649bddae" Scale="1"/]Why is it that a child's eyes always
seem to light up at the sight of a
train? My son was fascinated with
them, and it was the first toy he ever
wanted. I was the same way as a kid...
Even now, I'm wishing I could hop on
this train and go for a ride. Choo choo!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATRAINB:
[UE:Meta key="2fcdff78b54644a786e7c571c95a785e" Scale="1"/]Long ago, railroads were the lifeblood
of civilization, and the power to
transport people or supplies remains
key to our survival. Someone's got to
move the fuel, right? I like to think our
company plays a similar role in space.
It gives meaning to the daily grind.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATRAINC:
[UE:Meta key="71e9ecd4bef44a8aa218f2d572699794" Scale="1"/]As a student, I once took a local
train—a really slow one—on a journey
to wherever it was going. I was the
only passenger. The unchanging
scenery stretched on and on... I felt
like I was the only person in the world.
Sounds a lot like space travel. Huh.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAILWAYLINEA:
[UE:Meta key="23b59c9065a443b4835e9f2befae747d" Scale="1"/]During my first job, my parents would
meet me at the train station when I
got home from work. I always thought
I'd do the same thing for my kids, but
it's usually them waiting at the station
for me now. It always warms my heart,
but I wish I could return the favor...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAILWAYLINEB:
[UE:Meta key="7efb468b7d3f470ca21bec480635d0bb" Scale="1"/]They say that following the straight
and narrow path is a virtue, but I've
learned firsthand that it doesn't
always lead you to your destination.
When I started working directly under
the president of Hocotate Freight,
I thought it was the inevitable next
step in my career. All it led to was piles
and piles of paperwork... I'll be happy if
my kids take a slightly twisted route in
life, as long as it helps them achieve
their dreams.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAILWAYLINEC:
[UE:Meta key="dcc61a0a541c436b92bed95059642d9b" Scale="1"/]I always slow down on sharp curves,
but sometimes I crave the occasional
thrill of speed! Maybe if I floored the
accelerator while the parking brake
was engaged, it would satisfy my
desire... Sometimes I look around and
wonder if civilization isn't simply the
result of us all trying to satisfy our
desires just enough to stay productive.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAILWAYLINED:
[UE:Meta key="be8799b4bc154b159496658a5bd60836" Scale="1"/]I took my son to the zoo a few years
ago, and he suddenly started crying.
To calm him, I walked him back and
forth on a path with no exhibits. We
didn't see any animals that day, but I
learned that sometimes the best
solution is as simple as a change in
direction.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTARAILWAYLINEE:
[UE:Meta key="a28f2109d1164b8cb17200427b34cb80" Scale="1"/]Some people think I don't like the
concept of a set path or "staying on
the rails." That's not true at all! The
only thing that matters to me is that
I'm going in the right direction. How I
get to my destination is irrelevant...
much like the opinions of others!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADUCKL:
[UE:Meta key="1e1b490320634a18a07e88cc6ae16cde" Scale="1"/]The first time I laid eyes on this
treasure, I thought it was a giant
aquatic monster! It took me a few
paralyzing seconds to realize that it's
just a statue. What a relief... If such
an attractive creature were to attack
me, I'd be too entranced to run away!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADUCKM:
[UE:Meta key="9d9544d788d5405098698f89c08e45df" Scale="1"/]Has well-proportioned facial features
and a smooth exterior. Its hollow
interior allows it to float on water.
I thought long and hard about what
creature inspired this treasure, and
before I knew it, I was petting its beak.
I'm powerless in the face of cuteness!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADUCKS:
[UE:Meta key="e1d0dc9e60c644dbbd72fc8db812af52" Scale="1"/]Compared to the other treasures
found, this sculpture is tiny. Yet with
its beak turned courageously upward
and its round eyes brimming with the
spirit of adventure, I can't help but
admire its gallant image. Beauty really
can be found around any corner...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTADUCKB:
[UE:Meta key="6747f3e781f14fc2881781f358043ef2" Scale="1"/]When I was a kid, I coveted a black
leather jacket that hung in a shop
window. It was so cool! I begged my
parents to buy it for me, but they just
scoffed in my face. So I saved up my
pocket change for months and finally
bought it myself! It turns out wearing
a leather jacket during the peak of a
Hocotate summer is a shortcut to
getting a heat stroke. That was the
last time I ever tried to be cool.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFIELDGLASS:
[UE:Meta key="df3bffa503cb48c8990b22cc97234bc5" Scale="1"/]It's reminiscent of a telescope I had
when I was a kid. My father and I would
stare up at the skies together and
talk about our discoveries. That
telescope nurtured my adventurous
spirit... I'd love to meet the adventurer
who peeked into these lenses.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPOCKETWATCH:
[UE:Meta key="02279379b4d84790b0368df079e99f17" Scale="1"/]I was entranced by the longer needle
as it spun round and round, and I
completely lost track of time.
This object doesn't strike me as
otherworldly, but whenever I look at
it, it's like I can feel the space-time
continuum bending around me!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACOMPASS:
[UE:Meta key="4514a0b7317b44208061e0e08282eb14" Scale="1"/]The arrow-like object floating in the
center appears to move around at will,
but it's actually always pointing in the
same direction. It could be trying to
point me toward my destiny, but I'd
rather figure that out on my own.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTALOUPE:
[UE:Meta key="156a839cbd704ec684db1c3142a3f8eb" Scale="1"/]Everything looks so much bigger when
you peer through this lens! You can
see the smallest of details and all the
different components that make up a
single object. That's the proper way to
conduct a scientific investigation.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAEFFECTSUNIT:
[UE:Meta key="67844b8ff58b46768e999cab0f7af9c7" Scale="1"/]I'm picky when it comes to music, but
I'm fascinated by how a melody can
perfectly capture a person's soul or
even a specific feeling. I wonder what
my song would be... I'd like to think it
would sound bold and romantic and
reflect my adventurous career...
Maybe I should just write it myself!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAFINGERBOARD:
[UE:Meta key="ba13d4bc329e4b8f94a9033b65c81c86" Scale="1"/]The ability to stay balanced is critical
to exploration and space travel. It is
OK to lose your balance, as long as you
can regain it right away. This tool is
perfect for strengthening that skill.
The only problem is I can't get it to
move forward when I'm on my back...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTA3DMEGANE:
[UE:Meta key="87ad5e0f81a84d38844db47e4566cc27" Scale="1"/]What your eyes might see is not an
exact representation of reality. We
can only see one part of the world
within a narrow range of visible light.
This magnificent device proves that
theory! I'd love to show it to my kids
one day. It would boggle their minds!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASHUTTERGLASSES:
[UE:Meta key="31e6bff23503460fa2fe27d749da2db2" Scale="1"/]These shutters make it difficult to
see clearly ahead, so I'm not sure why
they'd be found in a dark cave... And
it's not as if they could even be used
as a proper hiding place! They remind
me of playing hide-and-seek with my
kids and pretending not to see them.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDA:
[UE:Meta key="85564aa2affe45f1963f70149c2cb081" Scale="1"/]Some might look at this and see a
symbol for life, but this treasure
better represents courage. The two
are closely related, of course. Power
and wisdom also have roles to play,
but without the courage to take that
first step...your journey cannot begin!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDB:
[UE:Meta key="423db0a954474ec4aba87f8209703417" Scale="1"/]There's physical power, and then
there's mental power. Anyone who's
witnessed an argument between me
and my wife could clearly see who's
quicker on their feet in the heat of the
moment... That doesn't bother me so
much. I just wish I had the same
fortitude and wit to stand up to
the president.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDC:
[UE:Meta key="74446005d95a43e190f67a610787ad61" Scale="1"/]Possessing wisdom isn't always a good
thing. Sure, you can examine a subject
from multiple angles, but you can also
get stuck in a maze of thoughts! Am I
envious of people who can just act on
instinct without overthinking every
last detail? Let's see. I don't... Maybe.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDD:
[UE:Meta key="5607c5e992eb42a888dcf95c2f50664e" Scale="1"/]If my travels through space and my
time spent observing various life-
forms have taught me anything, it's
that love can take many forms. Some
creatures get the nutrition they need
to grow their eggs by eating their
mates. But that's an extreme example.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDE:
[UE:Meta key="ca1196626f7e4babbbbf2ea0cb7b1a1e" Scale="1"/]The love I feel for my family and the
passion I have for my work are so very
important to me, but so is money. Love
and passion are all well and good, but
you can't appreciate any of it if you go
hungry, and you'll go hungry in this
universe without money.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDF:
[UE:Meta key="d3dc0630af344aff93de52c62313430e" Scale="1"/]In my line of work, it's crucial to stay
on top of your to-do lists. When things
are busy, it's easy to get sloppy and
let things slide, but that's when
consistency matters most! There's
nothing like that rush of joyful relief
you feel when crossing off a task...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDBLANK:
[UE:Meta key="cc7b875b20604d9dbcd047bb6f1d9c11" Scale="1"/]I once had a trump card—a premium
license given only to first-rate space-
navigation officers that allows you to
bypass the arduous license renewal
process. But I'm sure I lost that
qualification with this recent accident.
Guess it's back to annual visits to the
license-renewal planet on the edge of
space. The lines are always so long...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTABANKCARDBLANK2:
[UE:Meta key="5165eed645eb44feb1c5e89189ead490" Scale="1"/]Does true evil really exist? I can't say
for sure, but I have seen a smile like
this before. It often graces the face
of the president of Hocotate Freight,
usually when he's asking me to work
overtime...unpaid. Hmm... So I guess I
can confirm that true evil exists.
OtakaraDescOlimar.KINKAISTATION:
[UE:Meta key="e279573952324b01883a741b9cb312f4" Scale="1"/]Appears to have the same composition
as the gold on my planet. I've heard
that some heavy elements, like gold,
are created during rare collisions
between neutron stars, but to think
the same element exists on a faraway
planet reminds me...space is so vast.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATOMATOM:
[UE:Meta key="4db9f586ca964b40a7f7ed39e52892c8" Scale="1"/]This tasty red snack isn't quite a fruit,
but it doesn't seem like a vegetable
either. I've analyzed it extensively,
and whenever I think I've settled the
matter, I discover something new that
calls it all into question! This is why I'm
not a scientist by trade.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATOMATOS:
[UE:Meta key="6590631315a0459cb82f51bfe8b3e9d7" Scale="1"/]When I was a student, a girl in my
class asked me to go shopping with
her. It would have been rude to refuse,
so I went. My friends kept hassling
me, saying it was a date. It was so
embarrassing! But come to think of it,
my wife asked me out soon after that.
I wonder if she was jealous...
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTATAKENOKO:
[UE:Meta key="76559bc5ee27407eb73b5ce630e9edc5" Scale="1"/]This plant grows so fast it reminds
me of my own children. One day they
are little babies in my arms, the next
day they've sprouted up into fully
fledged people! I have my wife to thank
for that. She does so much while I'm
so frequently away for work.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAZUCCHINI:
[UE:Meta key="2428b939695e415e8843e351df7d31ee" Scale="1"/]I once saw a prototype of a spaceship
shaped a lot like this. Unfortunately, it
didn't fly straight. It just spun around
in place. Examples like that are why I
prefer a more traditional approach.
Being original for the sake of
originality is usually a waste of time.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPOTATO:
[UE:Meta key="23adbd12a4bd4112857c7d8b5774db21" Scale="1"/]During my explorations, I found
vegetables like this. I've never seen
anything like them. This dark-dwelling
vegetable stores all of its nutritious
energy in its roots. I think the name
that it's been given, Child of the Earth,
is very fitting.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTASWEETPOTATO:
[UE:Meta key="9291336a7a264cfea52d9add5a10849f" Scale="1"/]When my son was born, I was almost
immediately worried about him, but
it was different with my daughter.
I sensed from the start that she was
strong-willed and sturdy...a sweeter
version of her mother. This Daughter
of the Earth reminds me of her.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAEGGPLANT:
[UE:Meta key="666ccc0e6c9c4705b3a5f1381435a7cc" Scale="1"/]The shape of this fruit looks a lot like
my grandpa's face. It's so similar that
if I were to name it, I'd call it a
Grampy-Face Fruit... My wife always
thought my taste in names was
"catastrophically bad," which is why
she named both our children. But I
think this one has a certain ring to it.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPEANUT:
[UE:Meta key="23848ab396614785a8ff3cc3a413d8cb" Scale="1"/]I don't need any special tools to break
open the shell, and the fruit inside is
edible. Cracking these open is so
satisfying that I find myself getting
carried away and opening more than I
could possibly eat. Note to self: work
on moderation.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUMPKIN:
[UE:Meta key="e8a296bba2ee43529177c164e4100b88" Scale="1"/]Large...and the size is right for
retrofitting into some sort of vehicle...
maybe a carriage? But then what do
you do with all the goopy insides?
Flippantly throw them out the window
as you roll away in your fancy new
transport? Never! I am vehemently
opposed to wasting food.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTACANDYSTICK:
[UE:Meta key="e8a9cdee0f544701bab1915e3efd8294" Scale="1"/]A gigantic, brightly colored stick of
candy adorned with a ribbon. My guess
is that it was meant to be a gift for a
child...and would be a great souvenir to
bring back to my own kids. I'll need to
keep a close eye on the spaceship's
temperature to prevent its melting
during transport.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAPUDDING:
[UE:Meta key="b79573e02487487dbe639788eb441ee5" Scale="1"/]Children are fascinated by jiggling
objects like this. I know my kids would
lose their minds if they encountered
this gelatinous tower! I consider
myself a mature adult, and even I'm
fighting the urge to climb to the top
of this jiggling hill.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAECLAIR:
[UE:Meta key="0aae527a33f546758ea2ee2349b6966d" Scale="1"/]I hear this item was discovered in a
bright and open area unlike other
caves I've encountered. What's more, it
was presented on a large silver plate.
I wonder why it was there... Is it a form
of entertainment for visiting guests?
Or maybe...we are the guests.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAISOBEYAKI:
[UE:Meta key="c81ba78dd8ea40a4b38c651859174439" Scale="1"/]It's sweet...but not too sweet. Salty...
but not overly so. It tastes like
something a more refined palate would
appreciate. Perhaps belonging to
someone whose tastes were developed
over the course of many years.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYOSHICOOKIEA:
[UE:Meta key="e4206dd221ed4e49bd585190dd3f6e18" Scale="1"/]Stealing a bite of food before it's been
served is quite rude. But I understand
the impulse. My son and I are always
waiting outside the kitchen, itching to
try whatever my wife's been cooking.
Thankfully, she finds it charming, or
we'd have to curtail the habit!
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYOSHICOOKIEB:
[UE:Meta key="c5b645585897445790154911ce1d1ff3" Scale="1"/]This pattern always reminds me of
our family game nights. We like to play
board games, but it would be even
more enjoyable if we could eat the
boards after. I was curious to know if
the flavor was as playful as the
design, so I took a bite. Tastes normal.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYOSHICOOKIEC:
[UE:Meta key="3faec0f8e94346359b24f2eee9b3993a" Scale="1"/]Sweets don't simply disappear of their
own accord. There has to be some
sort of scientific explanation! To test
my theory, I've laid out the cookies
and am waiting... Normally, I'd have
given into my urge to eat them, but I
must stay strong.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYOSHICOOKIED:
[UE:Meta key="9045eaf749d44d298c6e71704ad82419" Scale="1"/]Before we got married, my wife took
a compatibility test to assess our
relationship. It was all for a laugh,
but we got 120 percent, indicating
we would be eternally happy together.
I don't really believe in all that fortune-
telling stuff, but that test got it right.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAYOSHICOOKIEE:
[UE:Meta key="8d349c539a614d3fba04a10079d6a27f" Scale="1"/]In my line of work, encountering tough
situations and feeling like your life is in
danger is all a part of the job. But
something about this cookie makes me
feel like I have the strength to make it
through. Like I have an extra heart if
my first one runs out.
OtakaraDescOlimar.OTAMACARONA:
[UE:Meta key="230cf1c41b6e4a179373900eb651da02" Scale="1"/]At our wedding, our friends gave my
wife and me a spaceship-shaped cake
that looked a lot like this one. It wasn't
as big, but it resonated with my
